words.definition: A large basket with wheels used for shopping.
words.arabic_definition: سلة كبيرة على عجلات تستخدم للتسوق.

example.en: I put the vegetables in the shopping cart.
The milk is in the second aisle.

words.definition: The area where you pay for your items.
words.arabic_definition: المكان الذي تدفع فيه مقابل مشترياتك.

example.en: We went to the checkout to pay.
The cashier gave me a receipt.

words.definition: A small container used for carrying goods.

example.en: I picked up a basket for my groceries.
I found a new product at the supermarket.
example.ar: وجدت منتجًا جديدًا في السوبر ماركت.

words.definition: A label showing the cost of an item.

example.en: Check the price tag before you buy.
example.ar: تحقق من بطاقة السعر قبل الشراء.

example.en: There is an offer on fresh fruit.

words.definition: A container used to carry goods.

example.en: I need a bag for my groceries.

words.definition: A card used for making payments.

example.en: I paid with a credit card.
